name: Weather Machine
description:
Created for the Epic Mega Jam 2022 "As Above So Below."

You control an experimental Weather Machine that endlessly makes effects, combine them how you see fit, but be warned some may be dangerous! Keep the population alive by balancing weather, temperature, and humidity, so the population can grow. 

Controls & Tips

A/D: Rotate Weather Machine.

S: Drop next effects.

Space: Drop current section.

ESC: Pause Menu.

Cold effects lower temperature and humidity.

Hot effects increase temperature and humidity.

Wrecking ball destroys whatever effect is beneath it, but it is dangerous to use on its own. 

The goal is to reach a population of 100 people. 

Keep the temperature near the middle and humidity between 20-60% for the most optimal population growth. 

 (This game is not fair or balanced)
